The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
Please note that ‘Saturday English’ classes begin this Saturday on the 31st of August.
Primary classes run from 10:00am - 12:00pm and Secondary classes from 1:00pm - 3:00pm
All classes are held at the Nanhu campus.
All students are to wait in the reception area and to arrive at least 10 minutes before the scheduled time.
If you would still like to enroll your child in one of our programmes, you can register this Saturday from 12:00pm – 3:00pm .
Looking forward to seeing you all.
Kind regards,
Shaila
尊敬的家长，
我们善意地提醒您， “周六英语课程”将在本周六 （8月31日）开始。 小学课程的时间为10:00am - 12:00pm， 中学课程的时间为1:00pm - 3:00pm 所有的课程都将在南湖校区展开。 所有学生都应该提早10分钟到达学校前台等待。 如果您有兴趣报名我们的课程， 可以于本周六12:00pm – 3:00pm 注册。 盼望看到你们。
诚挚的问候，
Shaila Chainani Head of EAL Pre Entry Assessment Coordinator The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
